original_text: Then shall the seers be ashamed, and the diviners confounded: yea, they shall all cover their lips; for there is no answer of God.
korean_text: 선견자가 부끄러워하며 술객이 수치를 당하여 다 입술을 가릴 것은 하나님이 응답하지 아니하심이거니와

sentences.original_text: Then shall the seers be ashamed
yea, they shall all cover their lips
sentences.korean_translation: 그렇다, 그들이 모두 입술을 가릴 것이라

sentences.original_text: for there is no answer of God
